metadata.name: Betty Thomas

persona.name: Robert King
persona.role: Existing customer, franchise gym owner (2 locations)
persona.goal: Renew/renegotiate service terms and schedule a callback with sales
persona.context: Current contract nearing renewal; wants to avoid price increases; can approve purchase but wants options laid out

intent.name: General Greeting / Start Conversation
intent.description: A customer opens with a greeting or minimal context, requiring a clarifying question to route.
intent.goal: Determine whether they are a new sales lead or an existing customer needing support.

emotion.name: Excited
emotion.description: Upbeat language, quick replies, eager to schedule; uses positive framing like “ready to get this set up” or “can’t wait to switch.”

metadata.outcome: Callback with Business Class sales agent scheduled and prep expectations clarified.

turns.content: Hi there—yes, I can help. What are you looking to do today?
Sure thing—what service are you interested in for your business?

messages: Sure thing—what service are you interested in for your business?

turns.content:
I’m looking at renewing and possibly renegotiating our current setup for my gyms—mainly whatever covers member management, billing, and any marketing tools you offer.  

Can you remind me what packages you have for multi-location fitness businesses, and how renewals usually work on your side?

I hear you’re looking to renew and possibly renegotiate your current setup, including billing and marketing tools. Our Business Class agent can walk you through options and renewal details. What date, time and timezone work best for a call?

messages: I hear you’re looking to renew and possibly renegotiate your current setup, including billing and marketing tools. Our Business Class agent can walk you through options and renewal details. What date, time and timezone work best for a call?

turns.content:
Perfect, that’s exactly what I’m looking for.  

I’m free tomorrow between 1–4 pm Eastern, and ideally I’d like something around 2 pm ET if that’s available. If not, next Monday morning (any time before noon Eastern) also works.
Got it—let’s lock in a time. Could you share your first and last name so I can set up the appointment?

messages: Got it—let’s lock in a time. Could you share your first and last name so I can set up the appointment?

turns.content: Great, Robert, you’re set for January 14, 2026, 2:00 PM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to call 5 minutes before. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Great, Robert, you’re set for January 14, 2026, 2:00 PM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to call 5 minutes before. Anything else I can help with?

turns.content:
That works, thanks—looking forward to it.  

One quick thing: will the agent already have my current account and contract details pulled up, or should I have anything specific (like current pricing or usage reports) ready for the call?
The agent will pull your account and contract info, but having your current pricing or usage details handy can speed things up. Let us know if you need anything else.

messages: The agent will pull your account and contract info, but having your current pricing or usage details handy can speed things up. Let us know if you need anything else.

turns.content:
Got it, I’ll have that ready on my end then.  

Nothing else for now—appreciate you getting this scheduled so quickly.
